Password too short, enter minimum 6 characters!

"♩ Nothing's Gonna Change My Love For You - Westlife | [Kara + Video] ♩
If I had to live without you near me The days would all be empty The nights would seem so long With you I see forever oh, so clearly I might have been in love before But it never felt this strong
Our dreams are young and we both know They'll take us where we want to go Hold me now, touch me now I don't want to live without you.
Nothings gonna change my love for you You oughta know by now how much I love you One thing you can be sure of I'll never ask for more than your love"
